League 1
Lille: "Osimhen, in a big club? Yes and that's normal!"
Klaus Allofs, who had recruited Victor Osimhen in Wolfsburg, spoke about the Lille prodigy.
02 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Hugo Deloraine



1. Real Madrid (146,000) While some teams are not fully qualified, others already have their place for the upcoming European campaign. Discover the UEFA coefficient of qualified teams (or almost) .Icon Sport

PSG, Lille, OL: all the coefficients of the teams qualified for the C1




In 2017, Victor Osimhen was recruited by Klaus Allofs from Wolfsburg. The former Marseille took advantage of the meeting between Marseille and Lille to express themselves in the columns of La Provence, on the new prodigy of Christophe Galtier, for which he praises.




"The big clubs will be there to take it"




Klaus Allofs + 33 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"Do I see him go to a big club?" "Yes, and that's normal." If he scores, he will be asked by the big clubs. did he declare. "You always have to ask yourself these questions: when is it too early or too late, is it the right choice, is it a team that suits you, that's very important. Victor feels good in Lille but he is an attacker and if he scores goals in the league and the Champions League, the big clubs will be there to take it, but it will be up to Victor to choose first, and his agents to make the right decision. "
